afk.description: sends an afk message if you get pinged until you write again

birthday.description: save your birthday and I will send a message on your birthday

day.description: The day you was born in.

month.description: The month you was born in.

year.description: The year you was born in.

get.description: get a list of the next birthdays

target.description: whose birthday do you want to get? Leave this empty to get the next 10 birthdays.

do_not_hide.description: don't hide my response to other users

remove.description: deletes your birthday from the database

getUser.title: %user's Birthday
getUser.newAge: He/she will turn **%input** on this day.

toggle.description: toggles the ability to send you user-made dms

target.description: the user you want to toggle, leave this empty to toggle all users ("*").

blacklist.description: lists all users you are currently blocking.

send.description: send a dm to a member of this guild

target.description: the user you want to send a dm to

message.description: the message you want to send, /n for newline

as_mod.description: shows 'a mod of {guild name}' instead of your name

toggle.saved:
Your blacklist entry for %user has been removed.
You can now receive dms created by %user from me.
toggle.removed:
Your blacklist entry for %user has been saved.
Now %input able to send you dms by me.
This will not prevent guild moderators from sending dms to you.

blacklist.notFound: You are not blocking any users on this guild.
blacklist.title: Your blacklist for the `/dm send` command
blacklist.description:
You are blocking the following guild members:
%list
blacklist.footerText:
run '/dm toggle' without arguments to toggle all users and
run '/dm toggle' with the 'user_to_toggle' argument to toggle a specific user.

send.targetIsMe: I cannot send DMs to myself!
send.permissionDenied: You are not allowed to send dms to that user!
send.asModInfo: Use the `as_mod` option to force the message to send.
send.title: You got a message
send.footerText: If you don't want to receive user-made dms from me, run '/dm toggle' in any guild.

happy.description: make the bot send a happy message

hash.description: encrypt or decrypt your text with various methods
hash.usage: SLASH Command: You only need to provide one method option.

input.description: the text you want to encrypt or decrypt

method.description: with which method your text should get encrypted (needed only once)

hash.noMethod: You need to provide one of the method options!
hash.title: Hash Function

type.description: The type/tag of the joke (not all APIList support this)

max_length.description: the max length of the joke (not all APIList support this)

joke.noAPIAvailable: Apparently, there is currently no API available. Please try again later.
joke.title: Is this funny?

sleep.description: tells your friends that you are going to sleep
responseList: is tired and goes now to sleep :3
sleeps now, hopefully he/she doesn't snores <:gucken:725670318164672543>

trigger.description: Manage custom responses to message triggers
the text you want the bot to respond to

response.description: the response the bot should send

wildcard.description: look for the trigger anywhere in the message (default: true)

delete.description: Delete a trigger. This is irreversible!

id.description: The trigger id, can be found using "/trigger get". Leave this empty to delete the last one.

clear.description: Delete all triggers. This is irreversible!

confirmation.description: Write "CLEAR ALL" to confirm the deletion of ALL TRIGGERS.

query.description: search for a trigger by its trigger content.

id.description: the trigger id, can be found using "/trigger get"

short.description: return as many triggers as possible

trigger.deletedOne: Deleted the trigger with the ID `%input`
trigger.needConfirm: You need to confirm this action by writing `CLEAR ALL` in the confirm option!
trigger.first25: The first 25 triggers. Get more with the `short` option.

wiki.description: Search for something on Wikipedia, or get a random page if no search terms were specified.

query.description: What you you want to search?

wiki.visitWiki: For more information, please visit the Wikipedia page.
